name: pink-scarf
effect: Held: Increases the holder’s Cuteness during a Super Contest’s Visual Competition.
short_effect: Raises the holder’s Cuteness while in a contest.

flavor_text.black_white: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts the Cute aspect of the holder in a Contest.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts the Cute aspect of the holder in a Contest.
